Sensing the incoming Cybertronian, Meteara turns her head towards him 
ang glares at him with threatening eyes. She moves not a bit.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Firaxis::
>        He ducks and cringes as the meteor passed overhead.  He 
opened a com 
> to SFC "Umm... I'm going to be a bit delayed in my arrival.  I'm 
going to go 
> check on that meteor."  He shuts down the com and heads off to the 
crater.  
> He looks into the crater and then up at Meteara.  "Ah slag.  This 
can't be 
> good."
